nodes.text: Ujin Voli was a male Gotal who was the leader of the Antar Band, a criminal organization active in the area of space around the Sisar Run.
Voli had a strong rivalry with Black Sun Vigo Sprax, another crime lord active on the Sisar Run, though Sprax's operations were much more vast than Voli's.
Voli owned a small hideout in an abandoned religious temple in Temptation Canyon on Sriluur. Voli also owned a starship called the Cones of Silence.
